version_description:
-  Support for live content streams
-  Ability to set reminders for your favorite shows
-  Usability enhancements
-  Bug fixes

- New interface design makes it easier than ever to find your favorite shows.
- Even more short clips, interviews, bonus scenes and exclusive videos.
- Minor maintenance updates and bug fixes.
We've improved video playback and added Airplay streaming support which will make it easier than ever to watch all your favorite Oxygen shows!

Bug fixes and improvements including:

- Support for multi-tasking on iOS 9.0 +
- iOS Today Widget
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Full Chromecast support 
• Watch videos in either portrait or landscape orientation
• One-click 10-second rewind
• Syncs with your password manager for faster login
• Refreshed design 
• Seamless integration with social networks to let you share videos instantly

• Bug fixes
• Performance enhancements

- Enhancements to caching
- Fixed miscellaneous bugs

• Support for iPhone X
• Performance enhancements to the video player
• General bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes.
• Minor bug fixes

• Bug fixes
• Performance enhancements
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes
We've redesigned our homepage and made it easier to find the shows you love most!
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed in this version:
-Video Player Screen Jumps When Controls Disappear

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed in this version:
-Homepage shelves were intermittently not displaying or taking time to appear

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Fixed: 
-Progress tracking wasn’t being captured correctly if the video was stopped and started more than once.
-Fully watched videos were ending up in the Continue Watching section.
Added: 
-Progress tracking begins when user has watched more than 1% of the video.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Changed: 
-Moved the episode information below the video - making it easier to quickly find what you're looking for.

We're constantly working to deliver the best app experience to you.
Changed: 
-We made enhancements to Google Chromecast.
All caught up on your favorite show? We've improved our end card experience making it easier for you to find new shows!

Thanks for using the Oxygen App. This update includes:
• New series and movies from the NBC Universal family of networks, including Bravo, E!, NBC, Oxygen, SYFY, USA and more
• Access to live streams across the NBC Universal family of networks
• Easier ways to find the shows and movies you love with dedicated brand pages, category filters and video previews
• A total redesign to improve the user experience
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes

If you’re experiencing issues logging into your TV provider, please uninstall and reinstall the app, then try logging in with your TV provider again. We are sorry for the inconvenience and are currently working to address this issue.
